php.LBL_MAIL_INTEGRATION_DESCRIPTION: CRM as an integration panel in an external mail client
php.LBL_OUTLOOK_ALERT: Add-ins installation instructions can be found at %s
php.LBL_OUTLOOK_ADDRESSES_DESC: Liste des adresses où le système sera disponible en tant que panneau d'intégration, obligatoire pour Outlook Web App, par ex. %s
php.LBL_OUTLOOK_SCRIPT_DESC: List of allowed CDN server addresses from which JavaScript files can be loaded, e.g. %s
php.LBL_OUTLOOK_ACTIVATED_ALERT:
Activation modifies the 'config / Security.php' file and reduces the security level, changes:
- it allows loading CRM in an inframe
- it allows loading of external scripts (https://appsforoffice.microsoft.com, https://ajax.aspnetcdn.com)
- it disables HttpOnly in cookie 
- it changes cookie SameSite to None
php.LBL_QUICK_CREATE_MODULES_DESC:
List of modules in which data can be created from the integration panel. 
 If no value is selected, the system will select the default quick create list
php.BTN_DOWNLOAD_OUTLOOK_INSTALLATION_FILE: Télécharger le fichier d'installation du module Outlook
